articles.description: There has been much scorn poured upon the new rule changes set to shake up the Big Bash League this season, but Marcus Stoinis can see merit in the new rules.
articles.content:
Big Bash League star Marcus Stoinis has gone in to bat for the tournament's maligned rule changes, arguing they will encourage positive tactical shifts in 20- and 50-over cricket.
